name: HannaH (GameDevDan)
description:
Made for GMC Jam 17 where the theme was "Synchronise", the handicap was "Dying in the game has twisted benefits" and the secret word was "Absurd".

HannaH is an adventurous young girl who enjoys searching for treasure. One day she stumbles into a dangerous temple. The evil temple master splits Hannah's soul into two pieces and forces her to complete a series of challenges with the help of the other half of her soul!
